com.hazelcast.client.connection.nio

Class DefaultClientConnectionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.connection.ClientConnectionStrategy
      • com.hazelcast.client.connection.nio.DefaultClientConnectionStrategy

  • public class DefaultClientConnectionStrategy
extends ClientConnectionStrategy
    Default client connection strategy supporting async client start, reconnection modes and disabling reconnection.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.hazelcast.client.connection.ClientConnectionStrategy

        clientConnectionStrategyConfig, clientContext, logger

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeConnectToCluster(Address target)
      If a cluster connection is established, this method will be called.
      void beforeGetConnection(Address target)
      The purpose of this method is to validate a connection request by target, and exit the blocking invocation.
      void beforeOpenConnection(Address target)
      If a new connection is required to open by ClientConnectionManager, this method will be called.
      void onConnect(ClientConnection connection)
      If the ClientConnectionManager opens a new connection to a member, this method will be called with the connection parameter
      void onConnectToCluster()
      If a cluster connection is established, this method will be called.
      void onDisconnect(ClientConnection connection)
      If a connection is disconnected, this method will be called with the connection parameter
      void onDisconnectFromCluster()
      If the cluster connection is lost for any reason, this method will be called.
      void shutdown()
      The ClientConnectionManager will call this method as a last step of its shutdown.
      void start()
      Called after ClientConnectionManager started.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        Called after ClientConnectionManager started. Connecting to cluster can be triggered from this method using one of ClientConnectionManager.connectToCluster() or ClientConnectionManager.connectToClusterAsync()
        Specified by:
        start in class ClientConnectionStrategy

      • beforeGetConnection

        public void beforeGetConnection(Address target)
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        The purpose of this method is to validate a connection request by target, and exit the blocking invocation. For all connection requests on ClientConnectionManager this method will be called. The build in retry mechanism can be stopped by throwing an instance of non retryable exceptions; IOException, HazelcastInstanceNotActiveException or RetryableException The thrown exception will be received on the blocking user. Any blocking invocation will exit by that exception.
        Specified by:
        beforeGetConnection in class ClientConnectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        target - address of the requested connection

      • beforeOpenConnection

        public void beforeOpenConnection(Address target)
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If a new connection is required to open by ClientConnectionManager, this method will be called. This request can be rejected by throwing an instance of non retryable exceptions; IOException, HazelcastInstanceNotActiveException or RetryableException
        Specified by:
        beforeOpenConnection in class ClientConnectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        target - address of the requested connection

      • beforeConnectToCluster

        public void beforeConnectToCluster(Address target)
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If a cluster connection is established, this method will be called.
        Specified by:
        beforeConnectToCluster in class ClientConnectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        target - address of the requested connection

      • onConnectToCluster

        public void onConnectToCluster()
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If a cluster connection is established, this method will be called. if an exception is thrown, the already established connection will be closed.
        Specified by:
        onConnectToCluster in class ClientConnectionStrategy

      • onDisconnectFromCluster

        public void onDisconnectFromCluster()
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If the cluster connection is lost for any reason, this method will be called.
        Specified by:
        onDisconnectFromCluster in class ClientConnectionStrategy

      • onConnect

        public void onConnect(ClientConnection connection)
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If the ClientConnectionManager opens a new connection to a member, this method will be called with the connection parameter
        Specified by:
        onConnect in class ClientConnectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        connection - the new established connection

      • onDisconnect

        public void onDisconnect(ClientConnection connection)
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        If a connection is disconnected, this method will be called with the connection parameter
        Specified by:
        onDisconnect in class ClientConnectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        connection - the closed connection

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from class: ClientConnectionStrategy
        The ClientConnectionManager will call this method as a last step of its shutdown.
        Specified by:
